channel.title: Comments on: Dust Off Your Hero Capes

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Maybe your permanent gaming record was flagged.
I like to switch IPs every so often to dodge my permanent record. Sure, it might seem paranoid to those not in the know, but perm records do exist. They're out there.
(Don't panic. I was kidding. Or was I?)
item.content:encoded:
Maybe your permanent gaming record was flagged.

I like to switch IPs every so often to dodge my permanent record. Sure, it might seem paranoid to those not in the know, but perm records do exist. They’re out there.

(Don’t panic. I was kidding. Or was I?)

item.title: By: Phil
item.dc:creator: Phil
item.description: I got the same deal. For some reason they called me a cocksucker in mine, though.
item.content:encoded: I got the same deal. For some reason they called me a cocksucker in mine, though.
